scripts.check: typical generate ../types/main.t --typescript generated/types.ts && npm ci && rm -rf dist && tsc --project tsconfig.json && eslint --config .eslintrc.js --ignore-path .ignore --report-unused-disable-directives --max-warnings 0 'src/**/*.ts' && prettier --config .prettierrc.js --ignore-path .ignore --check . && node dist/src/main.js
